data.name: Old School Musical - Chicken Party Mix
data.detailed_description:
Chicken Party Mix is an additional DLC including original songs from renowned chiptune artists such as Dubmood, Yponeko, Hello World, Zabutom, Le Placton, etc.
They are all playable in the Chicken Republic mode in Old School Musical.



Part 1:
  • 1 - Yponeko - You're Welcome
  • 2 - Dubmood - Keygen 22
  • 3 - Le Plancton - Ocean
  • 4 - Dubmood - Settlers 7
  • 5 - Dubmood x Wasp - Enemies Closer
  • 6 - Yponeko - Confucius Slam
  • 7 - Le Plancton - Fireworks and Fireflies
  • 8 - Dubmood - Rez Cracktro 4
  • 9 - Le Plancton - Ghost... GHOST!!!
  • 10 - Yponeko - Game Over City
  • 11 - Dubmood x Zabutom - Bad Television
  • 12 - Dubmood - Keygen 20
  • 13 - Le Plancton - I am ready...
  • 14 - Dubmood - On The Cobbles Of Hell
  • 15 - Dubmood - Keygen 21

Part 2:
  • 1 - Dubmood x Zabutom - St Style Medley
  • 2 - Dubmood - Solitude
  • 3 - Le Plancton - Naive
  • 4 - Yponeko - Over The Sky
  • 5 - Dubmood x Zabutom - Lösa Tankar
  • 6 - Dubmood - Keygen 23
  • 7 - Dubmood x MisfitChris - Making Music On The Internet
  • 8 - Dubmood - Keygen 19
  • 9 - Hello World - Mega 23
  • 10 - Dubmood - Power Without The Price
  • 11 - Le Plancton - Run For Joy
  • 12 - Yponeko - Running Through Fields
  • 13 - Dubmood - Datasalen
  • 14 - Yponeko - Watermelon
  • 15 - Yponeko - Love Song
  • 16 - Yponeko - Bonus Track Intro
  • 17 - Dubmood - Mountain Stage Breakaway (Bonus Track)
  • 18 - Yponeko - 8Bit the Musical (Bonus Track)
  • 19 - Yponeko - Battle Against the Game Over (Bonus Track)
  • 20 - Yponeko - Adventure (Bonus Track)
  • 21 - Yponeko - Sky Whales (Bonus Track
)
The Soundtrack will be available in the following Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\Old School Musical\

data.short_description: Chicken Party Mix is an additional DLC including original songs from renowned chiptune artists such as Dubmood, Yponeko, Hello World, Zabutom, Le Placton, etc. They are all playable in the Chicken Republic mode in Old School Musical.
